channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Paralympian turned astronaut John McFall could soon be the f
item.description: Paralympian turned astronaut John McFall could soon be the first disabled person to go to space – and he credits the Paralympics with helping to challenge preconceptions of what disabled people can achieve.

item.title: 4,500 Portland-area Fred Meyer workers go on strike, with un
item.description: 4,500 Portland-area Fred Meyer workers go on strike, with union claiming unfair labor practices.

item.title: The fall forecast is in and there’s some bad news for fall l
item.description: The fall forecast is in and there’s some bad news for fall lovers around the country.
